tool_description: Get Coupons and Sales Feed - Store Logo - and About Section for over 10,000+ stores from all over the world.
name: Global Coupon and Sales Feed
title: Global Coupon and Sales Feed

api_list.name: store
api_list.description: Get All Coupons, Sales, Coupons Count, Store Logo, Store URL, Country, About Section... Enter "storeId" to get All the good stuff for a particular store.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-coupon-and-sales-feed.p.rapidapi.com/store/ae"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-coupon-and-sales-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-coupon-and-sales-feed.p.rapidapi.com/store/{storeid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-coupon-and-sales-feed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: SearchStores
api_list.description: Autocomplete search for stores return StoreId, Name, Coupons Count, Sales, Store Country.... "StoreId" important to get all coupons and sales for a particular store.
